document.full_text: yemeni president ali abdullah saleh has agreed to step down within weeks in return for immunity from prosecution, putting him on course to become the third veteran arab leader toppled this year by street unrest.
document.title: yemen's saleh to quit but activists say protests go on
lines_and_colors: yemeni president ali abdullah saleh has agreed to step down within weeks in return for immunity from prosecution, putting him on course to become the third veteran arab leader toppled this year by street unrest.
